titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3843) to reauthorize programs to assist small business concerns, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-524, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3843 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments. At the conclusion of consideration, H. Res. 432 is laid on the table.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 176.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 439.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/14/2000--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 3843 (small business concerns programs reauthorizations).
